actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The lizardfolk attacks once with its shield and twice with its trident.

actions.name: Shield
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) bludgeoning damage  and the target makes a DC 13 Strength check. On a failure  it is knocked prone.

actions.name: Trident
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage  and the lizardfolk gains temporary hit points equal to half the damage dealt.

special_abilities.name: Aligned
special_abilities.desc: The lizardfolk radiates either an Evil or Good aura.

special_abilities.name: Hold Breath
special_abilities.desc: The lizardfolk can hold its breath for 15 minutes.
